des: "Delicious, refreshing summer beverage! Garnish each glass with a grapefruit slice."
ins: Mix lemonade, grapefruit vodka, grapefruit juice, lemon vodka, and cranberry juice together in a pitcher. Pour mixture into 4 martini glasses.
